column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I can't believe it took me so long to review
column2: because I love everything about this place! The building is white
column4: and beautiful with lots of room. Their pastries
column5: desserts and bread are all amazing with my favorite being the huge chocolate chip walnut cookie. I've had many cookies in my life and this cookie is my favorite in Houston. The only other cookie that I would say is better is the chocolate chip walnut cookie at Levain in New York (I feel that cookie might have inspired common bond's). It's huge
column10: and walnuty. Another bakery item that I love are the croissants. The almond croissants are delicious and when those run out
column11: even the regular croissants are great as well. They're huge
